backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining access control, blob storage mixins, data types, and CRUD logic for payments, receipts, committee members, jatres, contacts, gallery, and temple account.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related files, components, and test IDs for the temple website project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend admin and global style files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH variables defining theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for all public and admin pages with layouts and protected admin access.
Route guard that checks admin authentication and displays loading, denial, or authorized content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Admin dashboard layout with navigation, responsive menu, and logout handling using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Layout component with header, mobile navigation, footer, and temple-themed styling.
frontend/src/config/temple.ts: Defines static temple configuration details including names, location, UPI ID, and coordinates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks whether the authenticated user is an admin using the actor's isCallerAdmin call.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handles login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for payment workflows, balances, receipts, donors, committee data, events, contacts, and gallery items.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom color variables and utility classes for the temple theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminHomePage.t: Admin dashboard page listing navigation cards for temple management sections.
Admin login page that checks Internet Identity and admin status before rendering a login prompt or redirecting to the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/BalanceDashboar: Displays temple account balance and last-updated info with refresh support and explanatory notes.
frontend/src/pages/admin/CommitteeManage: Allows admins to view, add, edit, and remove committee members using dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ContactsManagem: Lets admins manage temple contact numbers, including adding, editing, and removing entries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DonorListPage.t: Shows a table of all approved donors with amounts, dates, payment modes, and transaction IDs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/GalleryManageme: Provides UI to upload, list, and delete gallery media items with file handling and upload progress.
frontend/src/pages/admin/JatreManagement: Admin page to list, add, edit, and delete Jatres with a form dialog and backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PaymentApproval: Admin interface to review, edit, approve, or reject pending payment confirmations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ReceiptViewPage: Admin page to view a single receipt, download, print, share, cancel, or regenerate it.
Public page showing committee members with roles and basic privacy notice.
frontend/src/pages/public/ContactsPage.t: Public page listing temple contact numbers with loading states and fallback message.
Public donation page enabling UPI donations and showing instructions for payment confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/public/GalleryPage.ts: Displays a grid of photo/video items fetched from the gallery API and shows a modal preview when an item is selected.
frontend/src/pages/public/HomePage.tsx: Renders the temple homepage with navigation cards linking to major public sections and showing basic temple info.
frontend/src/pages/public/JatreFestivals: Fetches and lists festivals sorted by date, showing details and activities for each event.
frontend/src/pages/public/LocationPage.t: Shows the templeâ€™s address with a Google Maps embed and provides a button to open navigation directions.
frontend/src/pages/public/PaymentConfirm: Provides a form for submitting payment confirmation details and shows a success screen after submission.
frontend/src/pages/public/TotalCollectio: Displays total donation amount and count along with a privacy notice and link to the donations page.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Utility functions for formatting currency, dates, payment modes, committee roles, and generating timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/receiptExport.ts: Generates a printable HTML receipt in a new window, formatting receipt details and handling cancelled state overlay.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Provides helpers to share receipt info using the Web Share API with WhatsApp fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes overall project goals, architecture notes, required images, and implemented features for the temple management site.
